titles: A general sale of rebellious houshold-stuff To the tune of, Old Simon the King.
notes: Satirical verse on the Commonwealth Parliament and government.
Imprint date altered in MS. to read: 1688; MS. date below imprint: 1647.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
